sourcesContent:
<template>
  <va-app-bar shadow-color='bg-slate-200'>
    <va-button icon="menu" color="#fff" flat :rounded="false" @click="menu = !menu" />
    <va-spacer />
    {{menu}}
    <va-button  color="#fff" flat :rounded="false">Login</va-button>
    <va-button-dropdown size="small" flat color="#fff" icon="ellipsis">
      Content
    </va-button-dropdown>
    <SideMenu v-if="menu" />
  </va-app-bar>
</template>

<script>

import { ref } from 'vue'
import SideMenu from '@/components/SideMenu'

export default {
    components : { SideMenu },
    setup() {

      const menu = ref(false);

      return {menu}
        
    },
}
</script>
<style>

</style>
